text: IMFI is an acronym for "Initial, Medial, Final, Isolated", a writing system in which each character has four different potential shapes: * initial – used for the first character in a word * medial – used in the middle of a word * final – used for the last character in a word * isolated – used for single-letter words The Arabic and Syriac script are examples of IMFI writing systems. Category:Writing systems
title: IMFI
